name: Snake 3d (itch)
description:
This is a prototype of a 3d snake game. There is a bug where the entire snake can collect food as opposed to just the head, and also that the last 2 sections of snake will not cause death on collision, but other than that it is good to go.

Controls:

W- Speed up

A/D- Left/Right

Left/Right Arrows- Left/Right
